column5: Has the ministry let up on the boat operators check list I have not heard much about this on WC or in general talk? I just found mine that was issued the first year they started this.
Not sure what you mean by ministry operators check list, but you do need to have all the required saftey gear, and a boat operators card.Fisherman1792
This is the paper the owner of the resort had to go over with you before you could legally operate a boat from his resort I think it was like 16 questions.
You still need the boater checklist if you don't have a boater operator card.
